ETL Conventions: *out_date* should be greater or equal than *entry_date*

User Guide: Indicates where a person was admitted from
ETL Conventions:
Values are not standardized yet.
Example values : *Transfert*, *Domicile*, *Mutation*

User Guide: Indicates where a person was discharged to after a visit
ETL Conventions:
Values are not standardized yet.
Example values : *Transfert*, *Domicile*, *Mutation*, *Décès*

User Guide: Represents the kind of visit that took place (inpatient, outpatient, emergency, etc.)
Code of the healthcare center, see *hospital_instance* for more informations
Indicate source software for this stay
Pseudo identifier of the stay. Use in correspondence table to retrieve patient identity when needed.

ETL Conventions: Defined at the start of the pipeline as `datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d%H%M%S")`
